summary: Jillian C. Evanko will transition from her role as CEO and President of Chart Industries, Inc. to a Senior Advisor on January 6, 2026, providing consulting services related to the company's merger until its consummation or termination. She will receive a one-time cash fee of $1,000,000 per month, subject to a minimum of $4,000,000 and a maximum of $9,000,000, payable upon merger completion, and will retain vested equity awards but forfeit unvested ones.
